title: Peter pan
description: Work on the cover of an edition of J.M Barrie's Peter Pan (just  for fun).

title: Les bourriches du bassin
description: Creation of a series of three illustrations for gift box covers taking the form of an oyster crate for the shop La Bourriche du Bassin, a delicatessen in Arcachon. Illustrations printed on wood.

title: Nike Christmas Popup
description: Description: Creation of a visual for a Christmas popup organised by the Nike brand (fictitious).

title: Les bourriches du bassin
description: Creation of a series of etching-style illustrations printed on fabric at Maison Moutet. Applied to various table linens (napkins, tea towels, etc.).
